long_description: The Thule Stroller Hydration cage attaches to your Thule stroller's handlebar to bring you the convenience of having your favorite beverage or a water bottle close at hand. No tools required. Compatible with all Thule strollers, sold separately.
short_description: The Thule Stroller Hydration cage attaches to your Thule stroller's handlebar to bring you the convenience of having your favorite beverage or a water bottle close at hand.
